text:
Today, we're learning English with another 
lesson from the Harry Potter legacy!

Are you ready? This movie will help us learn 
more about young Dumbledore, played by Jude Law,

as well as his relationship with Grindelwald 
and how this affects the war between them.

But before we start, each week we release lessons 
to help intermediate and advanced learners like

you improve your English in a fun and dynamic way, 
without getting lost, without missing the jokes and

without needing subtitles. So if you're new here 
make sure that you join our community of over

5 million learners by hitting the subscribe 
button and the bell down below right now!

When learning a new language it can be a huge 
challenge trying to figure out which words and

expressions are important and which ones you may 
never need. Without the guidance of a good teacher

you could waste a lot of time learning the wrong 
ones. But don't worry, because with our Fluent with

Friends course you can learn words and expressions 
that native speakers actually use every day.

Plus you'll have tons of fun doing it with the TV 
series Friends which various academic studies have

proven is the best show to learn English! In this 
course you will also learn how native speakers

reduce, cut and connect sounds which is the secret 
to understanding us no matter how fast we speak.

You can try it now for free with our
3-part Masterclass. So what are

you waiting for? Simply click up here or down 
in the description box below to sign up now!

then I definitely recommend that you 
check out this one next! Let's watch!
